chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (X : Type) (f : X -> X -> bool), ~ surjective f

Premises:
surjective = fun (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) => forall y : Y, exists x : X, f x = y : forall X Y : Type, (X -> Y) -> Prop Arguments surjective {X Y}%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.N
bijective = fun (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) => injective f /\ surjective f : forall X Y : Type, (X -> Y) -> Prop Arguments bijective {X Y}%type_scope _%function_scope
injective = fun (U V : Type) (f : U -> V) => forall x y : U, f x = f y -> x = y : forall U V : Type, (U -> V) -> Prop Arguments injective {U V}%type_scope _%function_scope
RingMicromega.xnegate_correct : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt ->...-> ~ RingMicromega.eval_nformula rO rplus rtimes req rle rlt phi env f
RingMicromega.negate_correct : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt ->...-> ~ RingMicromega.eval_nformula rO rplus rtimes req rle rlt phi env (RingMicromega.negate cO cI cplus ctimes cminus copp ceqb f)
ssrbool.elimN : forall (P : Prop) (b : bool), Bool.reflect P b -> is_true (negb b) -> ~ P
ssrbool.elimTn : forall (P : Prop) (b' : bool), Bool.reflect P (negb b') -> is_true b' -> ~ P
ssrbool.elimF : forall (P : Prop) (b : bool), Bool.reflect P b -> b = false -> ~ P
ssrbool.xorPif : forall (P Q : Prop) (b : bool), Bool.reflect P b -> Q \/ P -> ~ (Q /\ P) -> if b then ~ Q else Q
ssrbool.equivPif : forall (P Q : Prop) (b : bool), Bool.reflect P b -> (Q -> P) -> (P -> Q) -> if b then Q else ~ Q
RingMicromega.normalise_sound : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt ->...-> RingMicromega.eval_nformula rO rplus rtimes req rle rlt phi env (RingMicromega.normalise cO cI cplus ctimes cminus copp ceqb f)
ssrbool.xorPifn : forall (P Q : Prop) (b : bool), Bool.reflect P (negb b) -> Q \/ P -> ~ (Q /\ P) -> if b then Q else ~ Q
ssrbool.equivPifn : forall (P Q : Prop) (b : bool), Bool.reflect P (negb b) -> (Q -> P) -> (P -> Q) -> if b then ~ Q else Q
ssrbool.elimTF : forall (P : Prop) (b c : bool), Bool.reflect P b -> b = c -> if c then P else ~ P
ssrbool.elimTFn : forall (P : Prop) (b c : bool), Bool.reflect P (negb b) -> b = c -> if c then ~ P else P
ssrbool.elimNTF : forall (P : Prop) (b c : bool), Bool.reflect P b -> negb b = c -> if c then ~ P else P
ssrbool.decPcases : forall (P : Prop) (b : bool), Bool.reflect P b -> if b then P else ~ P
ssrbool.introT : forall (P : Prop) (b : bool), Bool.reflect P b -> P -> is_true b
VectorEq.eq_dec : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), {v1 = v2} + {v1 <> v2}
ssrbool.decP : forall (P : Prop) (b : bool), Bool.reflect P b -> ssrbool.decidable P
VectorEq.eqb_eq : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), VectorEq.eqb A A_beq v1 v2 = true < -> v1 = v2
Bool.reflect_dec : forall (P : Prop) (b : bool), Bool.reflect P b -> {P} + {~ P}
Field_theory.ropp_neq_0 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall r : R, ~ req (ropp rI) rO -> ~ req r rO -> ~ req (ropp r) rO
Field_theory.field_is_integral_domain : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall r1 r2 : R, ~ req r1 rO -> ~ req r2 rO -> ~ req (rmul r1 r2) rO
OrderedRing.Rneq_symm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, ~ req n m -> ~ req m n
Bool.iff_reflect : forall (P : Prop) (b : bool), P < -> b = true -> Bool.reflect P b
OrderedRing.Req_dne : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, ~ ~ req n m < -> req n m
Field_theory.PEpow_nz : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall (C : Type) (phi : C -> R) (Cpow : Type) (Cp_phi : BinNums.N -> Cpow) (rpow : R -> Cpow -> R), Ring_theory.power_theory rI rmul req Cp_phi rpow ->...-> ~ req (Ring_polynom.PEeval rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp phi Cp_phi rpow l (Ring_polynom.PEpow e n)) rO
OrderedRing.Rlt_neq : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, rlt n m -> ~ req n m
Field_theory.AFinv_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall p : R, ~ req p rO -> req (rmul (rinv p) p) rI
OrderedRing.Rlt_nge : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, rlt n m < -> ~ rle m n

```coq
intros X f.
intro contra_surjective.
apply (ssrbool.elimTn _ _ contra_surjective).
intros y exists_x_eq_y.
apply (ssrbool.elimF _ _ contra_surjective).
intro b.
apply (Bool.reflect_dec _ b).
destruct b as [b | b]; try contradiction.
rewrite <- exists_x_eq_y.
apply contra_surjective.
Qed.```

original: intros X f. intro contra_surjective. apply (ssrbool.elimTn _ _ contra_surjective). intros y exists_x_eq_y. apply (ssrbool.elimF _ _ contra_surjective). intro b. apply (Bool.reflect_dec _ b). destruct b as [b | b]; try contradiction. rewrite <- exists_x_eq_y. apply contra_surjective.
